```{r gender-mortality}

#What's the mortality rate of the Avengers by gender?
avengers %>% 
ggplot(mapping = aes(x = Gender, fill = Death1)) +
  geom_bar(position = "fill") +
  coord_flip() +
  labs(x = "Death",
       y = "Gender",
       title = "Mortality of the Avengers",
       subtitle = "By gender")
```
